intro: Stack the Love of Captain Marine!
description:
hololive members transform into adorable treasures!
Stack the 3D hololive members without letting them overflow to create your very own mountain in this must-play 3D puzzle game for hololive fans!


How to Play
Just toss the treasures and stack them on the island!
Combine identical treasures to transform them into larger ones!
The game ends when a treasure falls off the island!

Create bigger treasures and make consecutive combinations to boost your score through chain reactions!
And when you create the largest treasure, something amazing happens…!?


Treasure Exchange
The treasures that appear in the game can be swapped with other members!
Customize to your liking and create your own unique mountain of favorite members!


Rankings
Compete with players from around the world and test your skills.
Aim for the high score and keep challenging yourself!


New Features for the Nintendo Switch™ Version
This version includes all three DLC packs previously released for the PC version! 
By completing newly added in-game missions, you can unlock a total of four commentators and music tracks by talents!

Additionally, a new BGM customization feature has been added!
Combine your favorite BGM with your favorite commentator to create your very own Treasure Mountain and enjoy the game even more!
